name: Efficiency2.0
overview:
Efficiency 2.0 is a leading energy efficiency software and program administration company that helps utilities meet ambitious energy efficiency goals by supercharging customer engagement. We leverage behavioral psychology and consumer marketing best practices through our Personal Energy Efficiency Rewards (PEER) program to deliver efficiency and customer engagement benefits for our utility partners.

We are pioneers of the Consumer First approach to energy efficiency, a whole-house strategy that focuses on developing a personalized portfolio of technology and conservation measures for each customer to optimize the breadth and depth of energy savings. We are the first energy efficiency program provider to offer a comprehensive rewards and loyalty service to customers who reduce their energy consumption. This loyalty service provides real financial benefit to consumers who make smarter choices on energy and has been proven to generate substantially higher savings at a significantly more cost-effective rate than competitive programs.

We are a privately held limited liability company founded in late 2008 and based in downtown New York City, steps away from City Hall and Wall Street. Our mission is to empower millions of households and small businesses to better manage energy consumption in a manner that addresses the critical energy and environmental issues of the 21st century.
